meanings: (머리에 얹다) place[put] sth on the head

vlive.korean: 제목은 'Cry Cry' 였어. - 맞아! - 너 못 맞혔으니까 한 번 더 할게. The title is "Cry Cry". - Right! - I'll do one more since you didn't get it. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : GFRIEND's Broadcast

이런 거 였어? It was like this? 듣기 View video MYNAME : 2016 복날의 삼계탕
